   ~ type(text) intens(high) caps(off) just(asis ) color(&clrh)
     hilite(&clrhr)
   ¬ type(output) intens(low) caps(off)  color(&clrh) hilite(&clrhr)
   _ type( input) intens(low ) just(left ) hilite(uscore) color(&clrw )
   } type(output) intens(high) caps(off) just(left) pas(on)
     color(&clrt) hilite(uscore)
)Body  Expand(\\)
%-\-\(~PDSEGEN Primary Command Selection¬ver  %)\-\-
%Command ===>_zcmd
%                                                                              +
                       +Type in any necessary parameters,
         +then click on the command, or type in the command or number.

%Parms:_gopt                                                                   +
%                                                                              +
%Member Commands                                 %Filters
  +1}browse+%**  +4}edit+%**   +7}locate+%**  +10}today+ +13}year+
  +2}compare+    +5}filt  +    +8}submit+%**  +11}week+  +14}mine+
  +3}copy+       +6}find+      +9}view+  %**  +12}month+ +15}id+ %**
+
%Dataset Commands
 +16}backup+    +18}model+    +20}restore+
 +17}info+      +19}prune+    +21}validate+
+
%Dialog Commands
 +22}change+    +24}hide+     +26}output+     +28}set+   +30}reflist+
 +23}genonly+   +25}higen+    +27}refresh+    +29}sort+  +31}setmacro+
+
 %**+Indicates the Parms are required, others will prompt if needed.
)Init
 &ver     = &pdsegver
 &mine    = 'MIne'
 &id      = 'ID'
 &today   = 'Today'
 &week    = 'Week'
 &month   = 'Month'
 &year    = 'Year'
 &backup  = 'BACkup'
 &browse  = 'Browse'
 &change  = 'Change'
 &compare = 'COMpare'
 &copy    = 'COPy'
 &edit    = 'Edit'
 &filt    = 'FILter'
 &find    = 'Find'
 &genonly = 'Genonly'
 &hide    = 'Hide'
 &higen   = 'HIGen'
 &info    = 'Info'
 &locate  = 'Locate'
 &model   = 'MODel'
 &output  = 'OUtput'
 &prune   = 'Prune'
 &reflist = 'REFList'
 &refresh = 'REFresh'
 &restore = 'RESTore'
 &set      = 'SEt'
 &setmacro = 'SETMacro'
 &sort     = 'SOrt'
 &submit   = 'SUbmit'
 &validate = 'Validate'
 &view     = 'View'
.cursor = zcmd
.help = pdseghop
)Proc
 &zcmd = trans(&zcmd 1,B 2,COMP 3,COPY 4,E
                     5,FIL 6,FIND 7,L 8,SUB 9,V
                     10,TODAY 11,WEEK 12,MONTH 13,YEAR
                     14,MINE 15,ID 16,BACKUP
                     17,INFO 18,MODEL 19,PRUNE 20,RESTORE
                     21,VAL 22,C 23,GENO 24,HIDE 25,HIG
                     26,OUT 27,REF 28,SET 29,SORT 30,REFL 31,SETMACRO *,*)
 if (&zcmd = 1 | &zcmd = 'B')
     &zedsmsg = ''
     &zedlmsg = 'Parm requires a member- name or member-name generation'
     ver (&gopt,nb,msg=isrz001)
 if (&zcmd = 4 | &zcmd = 'E')
     &zedsmsg = ''
     &zedlmsg = 'Parm requires a member- name or member-name generation'
     ver (&gopt,nb,msg=isrz001)
 if (&zcmd = 7 | &zcmd = 'L')
     &zedsmsg = ''
     &zedlmsg = 'Parm requires a member- name'
     ver (&gopt,nb,msg=isrz001)
 if (&zcmd = 8 | &zcmd = 'SUB')
     &zedsmsg = ''
     &zedlmsg = 'Parm requires a member-name or member-name generation'
     ver (&gopt,nb,msg=isrz001)
 if (&zcmd = 9 | &zcmd = 'V')
     &zedsmsg = ''
     &zedlmsg = 'Parm requires a member- name or member-name generation'
     ver (&gopt,nb,msg=isrz001)
 if (&zcmd = 15 | &zcmd = 'ID')
     &zedsmsg = ''
     &zedlmsg = 'Parm requires a userid string'
     ver (&gopt,nb,msg=isrz001)
)PNTS
FIELD(backup)  VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(16)
FIELD(browse)  VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(1)
FIELD(change)  VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(22)
FIELD(compare) VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(2)
FIELD(copy  )  VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(3)
FIELD(edit  )  VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(4)
FIELD(filt  )  VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(5)
FIELD(find  )  VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(6)
FIELD(genonly) VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(23)
FIELD(hide  )  VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(24)
FIELD(higen )  VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(25)
FIELD(id)      VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(15)
FIELD(info  )  VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(17)
FIELD(locate)  VAR(ZCMD)  VAL(7)

@Tutorial -\-\(~PDSE V2 Member Generations@)\-\- Tutorial
@Selection ===>_ZCMD                                                           +
`
`  This dialog will display all members of the PDSE, including all member
`  generations.
`
`  Enter the PDSE Version 2 Library to be processed or * for a list of
`  previously used dataset names.
`
`  Enter the (optional) Member and/or Date Filter:
`
`       @*   `to filter for any number of characters
`       @%   `to filter for any single character
`       @ABC:`to filter for members starting with ABC
`       @ABC/`to filter for members with ABC anywhere
`       @/ABC`to filter for members with ABC anywhere
`       @ABC `to filter for just member ABC
@        Today, Week, Month, Year, Since yy/mm/dd, Since -nn
`
`  Enter the default line selection option to be used when S is used.
`  A valid option is B for Browse, E for Edit, V for View, or / for prompt.
`
)Init

)PROC
 &ZUP = PDSEGH0
)END

%-\-\(~PDSE V2 Generations Prune}ver  %)\-\-
%Command ===>_zcmd
+
+Prune will remove all generations beyond the number specified.
+(e.g. 2 will retain generations 0,1,2)
+
+Enter the number of generation to retain:$prune+0 to¬zmax   +
+
+Current Filter:¬prunef
+
+A Prune value of%RESET+will delete ALL members and gens
+based on the filter.
+
+Notes:  1. To limit the Prune operation use the FILTER
+           command before using Prune.
+        2. Suggest doing a Backup before a Prune
+        3. RESET must be in all CAPS
)Init
 .cursor = prune
 &ver = &pdsegver
 .help = pdsegh12
 &zmax = &zdsngen
 &prunef = &filter
 if (&filter = &z)
     &prunef = 'Off'
)Proc

    ver (&prune,nb,num)
)End
